description: Schemas in #/definitions detect or validate keys, objects or constraints variously applicable to Annotations, Bodies, Targets, Specific Resources, Textual Bodies, Items, and/or Sources (Section 3.3).
title: Definitions: Other Properties.

_88creatorSingularIfPresent.description: True when the annotation, body or target has exactly 1 creator (Section 3.3.1)
_88creatorSingularIfPresent.title: Validation: creator value

$eref.description: True when the object being tested (annotation, body, target...) has no created or has a single created of format date-time (Section 3.3.1)
$eref.title: Validation: created value

$eref.description: True when the Annotation has type key and 'Annotation' is a value of type (Section 3.1)
$eref.title: Implementation: Annotation type

$eref.description: True when object has exactly 1 source value and at least one of purpose, selector, state, styleClass, renderedVia, scope (Section 4)
$eref.title: Detection: Specific Resource

$eref.description: True when the object is an External Web Resource, i.e., includes an id that is of format uri but does not contain source (Specific Resource) keys (Sections 3.2.1, 3.2.4, 4).
$eref.title: Definition: External Web Resource

$eref.description: True when the object is an Embedded Textual Body, i.e., includes the value key (Section 3.2.4).
$eref.title: Definition: Embedded Textual Body

_88createdPropertyFound.description: Supports implementation check of created (if/when) used on External Web Resources, Specific Resources, Textual Body Resources (Sections 3.2.1-6, 3.3)
_88createdPropertyFound.title: Collate: created key with qualifying body/target classes

$eref.description: True when the object (creator or generator agent) has no name or has exactly one Agent name that is a string (Section 3.3.2)
$eref.title: Definition: Agent name value

_88agentSingularNameFound.description: True when the object (creator or generator agent) has exactly one Agent name value (Section 3.3.2)
_88agentSingularNameFound.title: Check for implementation of Agent name value

_88itemViaPropertyFound.description: Supports implementation check of items having via (if/when) used on External Web Resources, Specific Resources, Textual Body Resources (Sections 3.2.1-6, 3.3)
_88itemViaPropertyFound.title: Collate: items having via key with qualifying body/target classes

$eref.description: Supports implementation check of via (if/when) used on Annotation, External Web Resources, Specific Resources, Textual Body Resources (Sections 3.3.7)
$eref.title: Collate: via key with qualifying annotation/body/target classes

$eref.title: Check for implementation of Agent email value

_88generatorValidIfPresent.title: Validation: generator value

_88agentSingularNameDefinition.title: Definition: Agent name value

_88sourceViaPropertyFound.title: Collate: Specific Resource source having via key

$eref.title: Validation: audience value

$eref.description: True when the annotation, body or target has one or more creators (Section 3.3.1)
$eref.title: Validation: creator value

$eref.description: True when the Annotation has type key and 'Annotation' is a value of type (Section 3.1)
$eref.title: Implementation: Annotation type

$eref.description: True when object has exactly 1 source value and at least one of purpose, selector, state, styleClass, renderedVia, scope (Section 4)
$eref.title: Detection: Specific Resource

$eref.description: True when the object is an External Web Resource, i.e., includes an id that is of format uri but does not contain source (Specific Resource) keys (Sections 3.2.1, 3.2.4, 4).
$eref.title: Definition: External Web Resource

$eref.description: True when the object is an Embedded Textual Body, i.e., includes the value key (Section 3.2.4).
$eref.title: Definition: Embedded Textual Body

_88creatorPropertyFound.description: Supports implementation check of creator (if/when) used on External Web Resources, Specific Resources, Textual Body Resources (Section 3.3.1)
_88creatorPropertyFound.title: Collate: creator key with qualifying body/target classes

_88generatedValidIfPresent.description: True when the annotation, body or target has no generated or has a single generated of format date-time (Section 3.3.1)
_88generatedValidIfPresent.title: Validation: generated value

$eref.description: True when the object (creator or generator agent) has no name or has Agent name(s) of type string (Section 3.3.2)
$eref.title: Definition: Agent name value

_88agentNameFound.description: True when the object (creator or generator agent) has Agent name value(s) (Section 3.3.2)
_88agentNameFound.title: Check for implementation of Agent name value
